name: Gods Plan Dancing Line Piano
description:
Gods Plan Dancing Line Piano combines fast-paced gameplay with a Gods Plan songs to create an experience like no other. Featuring beautiful piano world of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique song. The key of control dancing line is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also hear and play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Make the line dancing and speed your finger.
Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level brings to you.

No special skills needed for Gods Plan Dancing Line Piano, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast finger! Touch and touch and here you go.
Gods Plan Dancing Line Piano features:

1.Gods Plansongs and more than 400+ US-UK piano songs and update daily
2.Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap to play
3.Music is the key to guide you : 100% hit soundtrack
4.Three level suited for you : easy, normal, hard. Dare you pass 100% with HARD mode?
5.Enjoy a brand-new level of sound quality. Best when use headphone.
6.Endless level with increasing speed of line and rhythm. How far you can go?

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Dancing Line through piano environment, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a turn, avoiding obstacles and run to the end of song.You will get 3 stars when reach 100% of song. If you die, don't worry, watch video to revival and continue reach the end of game.
Get two star to unlock one new song, three star to unlock two new song or just simple watch video to unlock new songs!

DISCLAIMER:
Gods Plan Dancing Line Piano is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Gods Plan, their management, or record label.

This app does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments and support, we can add more songs and make better games!
